about_section.title: About Us
about_section.tagline: Building the OSINT Layer of AI Infrastructure
about_section.description: We're pioneering the next generation of open-source intelligence (OSINT) tools for the AI era. By combining cutting-edge reverse engineering techniques, machine learning models, and open-source data analysis, we deliver state-of-the-art accuracy in intelligence gathering and verification.
about_section.mission_description: To empower companies and individuals with professional-grade OSINT capabilities. Whether you're building AI agents that need verified information or seeking personal intelligence tools, we provide the infrastructure that makes accurate, reliable open-source intelligence accessible to all.
about_section.vision_description: We position ourselves as the leading provider of OSINT tools in the AI infrastructure ecosystem. Our technology bridges the gap between raw open-source data and actionable intelligence, enabling smarter AI systems and informed decision-making.
about_section.address_value: Room 807, Block A, North Phase of Longguang Jiuzuan, Hongshan Community, Minzhi Street, Longhua District, Shenzhen

products_section.title: Our Products
products_section.subtitle: AI-Powered Intelligence Tools
products_section.intro: We build state-of-the-art OSINT tools that leverage artificial intelligence to transform how information is discovered and verified.
products_section.geoseer_description: GeoSeer is a sophisticated platform that uses cutting-edge AI to identify locations from uploaded images. Combining geoestimation models, multi-agent analysis, and reasoning verification, it provides unprecedented accuracy in image-based geolocation.
products_section.geoseer_feature_1: Fine-tuned geoestimation models for precise location detection
products_section.geoseer_feature_2: Multi-agent AI architecture with reverse engineering capabilities
products_section.geoseer_feature_3: Reasoning verification for validated, accurate results

team_section.title: Our Team
team_section.tagline: Meet the passionate people behind Ques
team_section.cto_bio: Specializes in Tactical Project Schedule Delays.
team_section.coo_bio: "Boss doesn't pay me, haven't eaten in three days."
